Class Treasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.items.Treasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collectable, Item

    public class Treasure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collectable
    Treasures are the chips which have to be collected to finish the game. They will not go in the entity inventory
